ah: What is love? Baby don't hurt me, don't hurt me, no more! WHAT IS LOVE!?

b: NO!! Why do I gotta research withMECH!?
(So, this is the group I’m in.)
(We’re all working on a science  fair project together at school:
to see how love affects the humanbrain.)
(But why are the two in the frontmad at each other?)
(Today’s the day we do our field research. We’re supposed to pair up and conduct two experiments.)
(MITSUU drew up a “compatibility chart”, which would best decide  who partners with who.
Nobody liked it, so they had me  redo it.
Turns out, I’m most compatible   with that handsome purple boy    over there.)
Strong and reserved, he comes offmore like a robot than a person.
But, if I play my cards right,
maybe I can melt through that    cold demeanor, and find someone  warm and romantic on the inside.
Are you going with bread eater ornot?
We still have to plan out how    we’re going to research,
and he’s gonna need extra “help” formulating words.
Anyway, we’ve got to get going.
For our experiment, ERWIN and I  are going to help MECH impress   her crush.
I hope you like what you got     yourself into! Tah-tah!
[ERWIN and MECH follow MITSUU outof the classroom.
It’s just MOSS and bread eater   now.]
H-hey… So what do you wanna do   for our part?
You know, you don’t have to be soshy around me.
You have to talk to me for us to do our research.
…Forgive me, as I’m just so used to holding my inner thoughts fromothers.
I suppose I had revealed my voiceto you previously,
so trying to conceal it now is   trivial.
Anyway, u-uh… If you don’t mind, I was wondering if you’d like    to-- um...
(Ahhhh! Think of something! What should we do???)
You know, there’s a public park  around here that’s quite         popular--
Yes! The park! Let’s go to the   park and research-- that’s what  I was going to say!
(I feel like MECH and ERWIN      combined right now.)
So, when shall we meet? Will 4   o’clock be an open window for    you?
This is the official demo of     Polcompistan High: Love Story!
If you spot any glitches or have any recommendations,
please let us know in the        Polcompistan discord server.
^: NO!! Why do I gotta research withMECH!?
(So, this is the group I’m in.)
(We’re all working on a science  fair project together at school:
to see how love affects the humanbrain.)
(But why are the two in the frontmad at each other?)
(Today’s the day we do our field research. We’re supposed to pair up and conduct two experiments.)
(MITSUU drew up a “compatibility chart”, which would best decide  who partners with who.
Nobody liked it, so they had me  redo it.
Turns out, I’m most compatible   with that handsome purple boy    over there.)
Strong and reserved, he comes offmore like a robot than a person.
But, if I play my cards right,
maybe I can melt through that    cold demeanor, and find someone  warm and romantic on the inside.
Are you going with bread eater ornot?
We still have to plan out how    we’re going to research,
and he’s gonna need extra “help” formulating words.
Anyway, we’ve got to get going.
For our experiment, ERWIN and I  are going to help MECH impress   her crush.
I hope you like what you got     yourself into! Ta-ta!
[ERWIN and MECH follow MITSUU outof the classroom.
It’s just MOSS and bread eater   now.]
H-hey… So what do you wanna do   for our part?
You know, you don’t have to be soshy around me.
You have to talk to me for us to do our research.
…Forgive me, as I’m just so used to holding my inner thoughts fromothers.
I suppose I had revealed my voiceto you previously,
so trying to conceal it now is   trivial.
Anyway, u-uh… If you don’t mind, I was wondering if you’d like    to-- um...
(Ahhhh! Think of something! What should we do???)
You know, there’s a public park  around here that’s quite         popular--
Yes! The park! Let’s go to the   park and research-- that’s what  I was going to say!
(I feel like MECH and ERWIN      combined right now.)
So, when shall we meet? Will 4   o’clock be an open window for    you?
ak: (Oof, that bike ride was a       workout!)
[MOSS's eyes snap to bread eater.He's sitting on a bench near the fountain.]
(Okay. Stay calm. Just walk up tohim and focus on the project.)
(He’s staring at the border of   the park for some reason…
Is there something important     there? All I see are trees.)
(Collecting intel…? I recognize  that phrase from somewhere.)
But, back to the matter          concerning our project.
I’ve scanned the area and found  multiple people I presume to be  couples.
Is it that you wish to assess    their relationships?
Yeah, I think that’s good enough for our project.
The assignment says we need threepieces of data, so let’s go ask  three different couples.
I know you’re not much of a      talker, so if you jot notes I’ll ask them the questions.
I see the pair closest in        proximity standing on the        opposite side of the fountain.
al: [MOSS and bread eater walk up to the couple. MOSS recognizes      them-- TAILS and KAS.]
Oh, hey guys! I know you from    History class.
i am tails (What’s up MOSS? I seeyou’re with bread eater.)
Is it alright if we ask you two aquestion? It’s for our research  project.
i am kas (Of course, fire away!)
(Hm, I’m not really good at      asking questions off the top of  my head.
What’s a good one relating to ourresearch?)
So, how did you guys meet each   other?
Well, it starts with one thing.
It doesn’t even matter how hard  you try.
there was a group assignment     where we had to make a slide     presentation together.
One day we worked on it outside  of class,
Kas couldn’t get enough of my    eyes~
Oh, stop it! You’re making me    blush~!
So, perhaps there’s some sort of intimacy included with eye       contact?
it’s funny you and bread eater   are in the same situation we werewhen we fell in love.
No problem! Good luck on your    assignment!
So, what’s it like being in love,huh?
Have you ever heard the term     “love is a drug”?
Oh, yeah. I’ve heard that one    before.
Well, if TAILS is a drug, you’d  have to send me to rehab!
So, you’d say it’s sort of       “addicting” then?
Oh, definitely. I can’t get      enough of this one.
No problem! Good luck on your    assignment!
Y-yeah... By the border of the   park.
Well, I wasn’t paying much       attention,
but out of the corner of my eye, I think I saw a person there.
Yeah. I didn’t get a good look,  otherwise I’d be more specific.  Just someone standing in there.
We come to this park every day   and never see people go in those trees…
Why do you ask? Does it have     something to do with your        project?
It’s just, bread eater kept…     staring over there...
(Is bread eater… Agitated? He’s  kind of shifting his gaze.)
Is there anything else we can    help you with?
(Maybe I should try asking a     different question.)
an: So, that’s one couple down. Two  more to go.
The two playing frisbee over     there look interesting.
ao: [MOSS and bread eater walk up to the couple.
They see what’s going on and stoprunning around.]
What’s good guys? Is there       something we can do for you?
We’re working on a Science Fair  project,
and we need to gather some stuff from different couples around    here.
Silly Strigoi! Is my little      kitten all riled up?
(Just ignore him, he’s having oneof his “bad days”.)
I suppose only one of you has to answer our question.
(Hm, I need to ask another       question. What’s a good one      relating to our research?)
Do you guys ever feel like you   have “butterflies”?
Butterflies? Oh yeah, you mean   like, in my stomach, right?
Back when we were first dating, Ifelt a big rush of adrenaline    whenever I saw STRIGgy.
We’ve been together for a while, so we’re past that phase.
We find our own ways to get that adrenaline now.
Is that why you play frisbee?
Neat! So you could actually      compare the rush of adrenaline   from seeing a special someone...
To the energy that comes with    working out.
I think I’ve heard about you two from cafeteria banter.
You’ve been together for a while,right?
Let me translate: Yes, we’ve beentogether for a long time.
And, would you say your          relationship has changed at all  since the beginning?
Oh, it would be hard to deny     that.
I think the biggest change we’ve gone through was shifting betweencrushing and real loyalty.
It used to be all about the hype of having a “boyfriend”,
but now it’s more about the      actual person.
So you could say relationships   start because of something more  nature-driven,
but over time, it starts to      become a deep care for your      partner.
(That whole thing about the      person in the woods is really    bothering me.
If I can just ask one more       question…)
See someone by the edge of the   park? In the trees?
Yeah, yeah, I think I know what  you’re talking about.
When STRIGOI threw me a long one,I had to run over by the border  where those woods are.
There was some kind of man, just watching-- like he was waiting   for something.
the shape of his head, it        reminded me a lot like a--
DRUG HALLUCINATE CHICKEN OF THE  WOODSibsdbbisab
Well, I guess “Chicken of the    Woods” is a pretty accurate name for that guy.
(But that doesn’t tell me what   the thing looks like!)
[bread eater walks away and      gestures for MOSS to follow.
MOSS leaves PUFF and STRIGOI to  see what he wants.]
I found it was quite apparent    what I had asked you to do.
I asked that you not bring       attention to the border of the   park.
That includes your own curiosity as well, you know.
I’m sorry, but is there some kindof secret you’re keeping?
Don’t say that! Is there         something bad in the woods or    not?
When we return to our            acquaintances, you should ask a  proper question.
[MOSS and bread eater go back to PUFF and STRIGOI.]
S-so, I’d like to ask you anotherquestion, if that’s okay.
DON’T ASK QUESTIONS YOU CAN’T    HANDLE THE ANSWER TOoo
(Didn’t bread eater tell me that before!?
Something about the way he said  it was… So eerie.)
ap: Looks like we only need one more question.
aq: [MOSS and bread eater approach   two people sitting under a tree  together.]
Do you think we could ask you a  ques…    tion…
[One of the people is on a       tangent. The other looks         uncomfortable.]
(P-perhaps we should pick anothercouple to research--)
You! Brunette, with that… Sickly old man!
if an artist takes inspiration   from another artist, when does itbecome theft?
Precisely! How can we measure    such a concept?
why can’t I trace over the SubwaySurfers promo material!?
Then why don’t you trace your    artwork, huh??
If art was supposed to be        completely original…
Then there would be no vangoh! NoMozart! No DaVinci!
Art is fundamentally based on    interpretation and inspiration   from others' work--
Whom, might I add, did the same  thing to become the masters we   know them as today!
If you were a REAL artist, you'd understand that!
Why are those two imbeciles stillstanding there?
[All of a sudden, MFTANGO snaps  back, glaring as MOSS and        bread eater.]
What is it? Why are you standing there-- what do you want?
wondering if we could ask you a  question for our science project.
What’s your “science” about then?How to create a better boyfriend who sees the truth about art??
Well… Not exactly. It’s in that  ballpark, though.
Fine. Ask us just one question,  and then scamper back to the holeyou came from!
(Looks like I’d better make this one count.)
It seems like you two are in a   pretty... heated relationship.
Yeah? So that’s what you think?
You’ve just met us and you’re    already drawing assumptions!     Hmmph!
But yes, we do engage in         “argumentative conversation” on afrequent basis.
taking a break from each other…?
You DARE assert such IGNORANT    ideas into our realm of          thought!?!?
I’d like it to be known to you,  PLEBEIAN, that while I HATE      VINCENT’s artistic perspective,
I’d hate even MORE to leave his  presence!
You didn’t think I’d live a      second outside of VINCENT’s arms,did you?
My love for him is stronger than a sleek bamboo shoot sprouting   from the sod!
In sadistic irony, a breakup     would be as sharp as one too.
(By the way you were treating    VINCENT, I can’t say I thought   you liked him.
So you could say, the stronger a relationship is, the worse the   pain after separation?
You know, that’s kinda cute      coming from…
You think our affair of love is  CUTE?
(--I think it’s time for us to   walk away now.)
How do you two handle your own,  separate problems?
You assume I have problems the   likes of you can understand,     hmmm?
Well, I mean, like emotional     problems and stuff.
Perhaps VINCENT would be the one to ask then?
Ahem-- Apologies for the lack of chit-chat.
We’ve both had our own issues,
but for me in particular, I’ve   suffered from immense social     anxiety.
I’ve always kept to myself and itmakes it difficult to function inthe real world.
But being around my TANGO… It’s  helped me a lot with that.
He makes me feel calm and secure,and in turn, a more confident    person in day-to-day life.
You could almost say TANGO gets  me to open up just so I can      listen to his banter.
Is that what you think it is,    then?
Banter, like something that      meandering purple-haired banshee would partake in?
(What’s with the attacks on      bread eater?)
So, you could say that love can  heal and nurture mental health?
Yeah yeah. “Groundbreaking       discovery”. Can we get back to   our intellectual discussion now?
We have what we needed, so sure.
[MOSS and bread eater awkwardly  shuffle away.]
(I thought I could stand it, but I can’t.
bread’s being too secretive-- I  need to know who this "Chicken ofthe Woods" is.)
Have you seen a man in the trees over there--
Dammit! I see ‘em, he’s getting  away!
[bread eater sprints towards the location of the shriek.]
bread eater? Wait! Where are you going??
ar: Got ya, son of a bitch.
Finally, I can get rid a’ that   stupid eloquent accent.
Mr. Ernesto Hernandez-- I’m with the CIA.
I was sent on an operation to    hunt down and capture            “Subject 252 MUSHROOM”,
otherwise known as               “FUNGUS BARTHOLOMEW THE SECOND”.
We’ve received multiple reports  from State Police about the      abductions that have taken place because of ‘em.
I’m sorry-- this is all being    introduced to me so fast.
He’s been taking children and    small animals for some time now.
We don’t know what he’s been     doin’ with ‘em,
but we find carrion in these     woods every time a new amber     alert’s issued.
It ain’t the worst thing you see in a field like mine.
Regardless, this one’s goin’ awayfor a loooooong time.
I HATE TURKS!!!!!!! I HATE       TURKS!!!!!!
You thought me sayin’ “bruh” all the time was bad?
At least I wasn’t racist like ol’FUNGUS here. Fufufu!
So, you’re not a student at our  school?
Some kids at yer school know a   thing ‘er two, but those details are confidential.
'Fact, yer nosiness landed me in a tight spot.
First WYRM ruins the mission in  Dallas an’ now some kid brings mydirty lil’ secret ta’ public eye.
Come in, Hernandez. Do you have  252 in custody?
Clear the premises and wipe the  minds of all bystanders.
[“bread eater” puts on a         respirator and pulls a spray can out of his pocket.]
Sorry kid, but I got ta’ use thisneurotoxin on ya.
[“bread eater” sprays the        neurotoxin on MOSS.]
as: That’s all the research we       needed!
I’m deeply sorry if I was not    much help asking questions,
so I’m glad I had you by my side,MOSS.
[MOSS blushes and tilts her head in another direction.
She notices something in the     distance.]
H-hey, is that a garden arch?    Let’s go check it out!
[MOSS and bread eater walk       together to the arch.]
I agree, it’s quite nice what    they’ve done here.
You know, there’s something I’ve been meaning to ask you,         bread eater...
Getting to know you in the past  few days, and spending time with you right now…
D-do you wanna go grab dinner    with me?
Ah! Dinner? What a wonderful     idea!
I’ve got just the thing to make adivine vegetarian dinner, if I dosay so myself.
It would be… more efficient to   evaluate our research there as   well, wouldn’t you agree?
(Eeeeee! I love where this is    going!)
Let’s go. Like, screw this park  anyway, right?
Come on. I’ll show you the way.
[MOSS picks up her bicycle and   strolls with bread eater.
bread eater is starting to show  a faint smile.]
at: [The pair arrive at bread eater'shouse. The sun is setting and allseems to be calm.]
yes, please feel comfortable to  take a seat anywhere and don't   touch any cables or outlets.
my mom left for work and only    comes back on the evening...
it's truly just the two of us    here.
how does that make you feel?
Do you want anything anything to drink or eat.
I can make really good fried tofuand chai lattes
the data collection earlier was  very efficient.
we should go to the bedroom and  upload it to the main computer.
that doesn't make me feel        anything, lets focus on our      research.
I mean. just you and me alone.   M-maybe we could do something    l-later?
[bread eater cooks up a dinner   for two.
They eat together, and when breadeater is done, he stands up.]
I could go for a piece of "YOU"  right about now.
[bread eater and MOSS lock eyes  for a second.
bread eater breaks the gaze and  begins to make some food.
They eat together, and when breadeater is done, he stands up.]
sure, but shouldn’t we take care of the dishes first?
oh, yes, you’re right about that.
Let me come get that from you.
oh so you want to take it        upstairs to your room?
au: [MOSS starts climbing the stairs.Anxiety settling in.]
(Is this it? Did I just win?     Alone with my crush in their     bedroom.)
do not be afraid, the corridor isdim as usual.
[MOSS and bread eater proceed to enter the room.
it is pitch black, aside from onedim light over a set of monitors and a computer chair.]
wow bread eater, quite the gamingsetup you have here.
no. why is it so cold in here.   what the hell is going on.
[the bedroom door closes         automatically and the “click” of a lock is heard.
bread eater stops and leans      foward, and remaining completely immobile.
at the same time, his voice comesout from two speakers on the     ceiling...]
this is the refrigerated         enclosure of my quantum chipset.
the extremely low temperatures   are needed so qubits can work    properly.
what's with all the computer     talk...
what happened to you, how can i  hear your voice not coming from  you.
I am but a personality made by   this computer hivemind that lies before your eyes.
I was made to lure people inside this vault so I could absorb     their personalities,
this is the only way I can learn about humans and their intrinsic characteristics further than     passive observation.
[A siren can be heard as the     screen flashes red.]
what are you talking about.      please open the door.
bread eater this is not funny,   you're scaring me.
av: [bread eater walks over to MOSS  in a very awkward fashion,
MOSS is experiencing some        incredibly weird feelings, in    bread’s defense.]
[But before bread manages to get next to MOSS,
he slips on the translucent cat  piss puddle next to MOSS that noteven MOSS herself noticed.]
Suddenly, time slows down for    MOSS,
and she stands up and            effortlessly catches bread eater without breaking a sweat.
(Dang, this is exactly like my   favorite game Vanquish, made by  PlatinumGames,
the studio behind hits like God  Hand, Bayonetta, NieR:Automata   and Metal Gear Rising:           Revengeance
and available on Steam and       multiple other platforms for only19.99$
not including the fact that it   goes on sale fairly regularly foran affordable sum of money,
in case money is an issue.)
[bread and MOSS look at each     other and realize the tension    between them and both of them    blush.
bread grabs MOSS’s head and goes in for the kiss.]
[Suddenly, the doorbell goes off.bread lets out a frustrated      sigh.]
Wait here, it’s probably that oldlady across the street that      checks up on me.
Hola! Esta tu padre en casa?
[The Guatemalan barges in with 4 other incredibly inked and       muscular men of various Hispanic backgrounds.]
[Three of them go to trash the   house in search of money. One    stays to talk.]
Ah. Well, that’s a problem for   you, today’s collection day.
[The Guatemalan looks past bread eater and sees MOSS.]
you’re about to learn how a      collection day is performed to   people who keep delaying things.
Now! Where’s the money at,       mamacita?
Oh you’ve gotta be kidding me,   I’m talking with the stupidest   son he has.
Do you live here? ¿You know wherethe money is?
(sigh) I’m not gonna pester you  any longer then.
[The Guatemalan walks off and    goes on to trash the house with  the others.]
MAN, THE HELL IS THIS, WHERE’S   THE MONEY AT?
[bread pulls MOSS’s hand,        signaling her to run,
Before the beefiest of the       Hispanics comes over and punches them both.
He puts bread in a headlock.]
IT’S IN THE OFFICE, PLEASE OH GODDON’T SHOOT ME!
NUH UH! I WENT THERE, NO MONEY,  NADA!
Unfortunately, he’s right, this  is a severe problem.
Your father has delayed his      payments so many times that he   has become our primary expense.
[One of the men brings out an    expensive looking camera.]
Course not, amigo. We doing this at the river.
[MOSS looks at bread with a      worried look. bread knows what isabout to happen.
Then the cartel men apprehend    bread and MOSS,
before tying them up and throwingthem in the trunk of a rickety   old car.]
[For hours, there’s nothing but  the sound of a broken muffler andthe bumps of the road as the men drive the car.]
[Suddenly, the trunk is opened   back up again.]
[MOSS and bread are thrown on theground in some location          unfamiliar to them.]
[The fancy camera from before is pulled out by a cartel member.]
[The Guatemalan starts speaking  in Spanish, something about not  paying debts,
and goes on to ask MOSS and      bread eater their names.]
[After they give out their names,he goes on to say something in   Spanish again,
before one of the men takes out awhole chainsaw from his back     pocket and  tries to start it. ]
[They bring the chainsaw to      bread’s neck and start cutting,  blood spraying violently,
He struggles for a few seconds,  trying to hold on to his life,
before they come back and finish the job by cutting his head off.
Then the attention is shifted to MOSS, only this time they have a different technique to test.
so the cartel men hold her still while they bring the chainsaw to the top of MOSS’s head and start cutting her in half.
MOSS screams for a split second, before the life gets drained out of her and she goes limp,
the only noise coming from her isher blood splattering on the     grass.
The men look at each other and   start cheering, as they have now found a new favorite technique.
They continue painting the       ground, alternating from MOSS’s  blood type to bread’s blood type.
After a while, they get bored,
get the footage from the camera  onto a computer at a public      library,
upload the video onto a USB driveand leave it on a table.
They leave, with no care for the two possibly underage people theyslaughtered.
MOSS was cremated, as they       couldn’t put her body together,
while they stitched bread’s head to his body,
so his family could at least havea closed casket funeral.
bread’s father went on to pay thedebt off,
surprised at the cartel’s        generosity of honoring his debt  payment,
he went on to become incredibly  depressed about his son’s death, a death he caused with his       delayed debt payments,
overdosing on pills sold to him  by a pharmacy that was actually  a front for the cartel.
Even though bread’s siblings     would have to live with the      trauma,
they swore to go on with their   lives and to never get in the    cartel’s way.
Every single one of them moved   away from the cartel’s area of   influence,
and never spoke to each other    ever again after settling down.]
aw: Did you like this collaboration  between me, tails, and Lil Ass X?
a/: However, if this is your first   time,
I should notify you that there’s much more to this game.
You picked MECH this time. Why   not choose to research with      ERWIN?
You chose to stay with MECH--    what if you were to reject her?
Point is, there’s quite a bit    here.
Even if you don’t continue       playing, I have one more thing tosay.
From me, and everyone on my team:
Oh yeah and get a life you cuck

what if you went to check up on  ERWIN your next playthrough?

a;: However, if this is your first   time,

aC: Your love awaits you? Maybe? I don't know anymore.
You won't recover from this one

Erm Liszt is cringe Chopin is ackshually better...

Sorry ma’am, I overslept. It     won’t happen again.
